title: If a wall made of WIND can stop projectiles, then how come..
body:
If Yasuo's wind wall (literally a wall of flowing wind) can stop projectiles, then why can't 

Anivia's ice wall?
- I would imagine it's a lot stronger? 

Azir's ultimate? 
- It's literally a wall of soldiers holding shields, definitely stronger

replies.body: Because as we all know applying real world logic to a video game makes tons of sense
both of those walls have a lot of empty space through which projectiles can travel
Azir's wall works the exact same way as Yasuo's, it comes from the character and pushes out.
except it's impassable.. and you can walk right pass yasuos.
ya Yasuo's wall is literally a normal skill on what? A 12 sec cd with no mana cost? Ffs you better be able to walk through it
i was expecting u to say "graves cant have a cigar"
In all honesty I should of lmao

You do realise wind is just the movement of air and dust particles right?

Given if you have strong enough wind, cutting planets will be no problems at all, assuming if you have that strong enough of an energy source backing it up.

Ice on the other hand is just solid water.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UgkcaTTA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-22T01:33:32.620+0000)
>
> Ice on the other hand is just solid water.

I mean, you're not wrong... but "just" solid water is still very strong. 
(Didn't mean to Dr. Seuss up in this bitch, but shit happens)

> [{quoted}](name=Environmentalist,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UgkcaTTA,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-10-22T01:37:44.665+0000)
>
> I mean, you're not wrong... but "just" solid water is still very strong. 

Yeah I do understand it is tough, but still a block of ice still has its limit as long as we're not taking about the one that's so huge it creates ice age...
And so does wind -_-' have limits

> [{quoted}](name=CHOPSTICKUHH,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UgkcaTTA,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-22T01:43:44.287+0000)
>
> And so does wind -_-' have limits

Wind doesn't have a limit outside of light speed and you can just keep adding energy to it.

While you can't keep adding energy to ice without having it turn into liquid water or steam.

EDIT: I am entirely aware that I am just arguing for the sake of arguing here though lol.
Stop, pls ffs you're brining is physics to a video game, yasuo ain't in outer space throwing wind around

> [{quoted}](name=CHOPSTICKUHH,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UgkcaTTA,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-22T01:53:18.182+0000)
>
> Stop, pls ffs you're brining is physics to a video game, yasuo ain't in outer space throwing wind around

Huehuehuehuehue

Ya that would be cool if Yasuo's wall was treated like that and actually animated like that instead of the little pussy wall of blowing air that comes out his asss crack that somehow stops a mega death rocket but a wall of literal fuucking sheilds can't block
It stops champions? And if you've ever seen football those things are a little harder to stop than arrows, plus Windwall deflects projectiles which is different from straight stopping them
